description:
Customizable neon sunset. Lots of custom shaders.

- Customizable colors for everything.
- Infinite scrolling terrain.
- VHS noise and glitch effects.

[h1]UPDATED 31-10-2018
You need the last version of Wallpaper Engine or this wallpaper won't work right so if you have issues, make sure Steam updated the program.[/h1]
The update added sliders for the amount of noise, height of the terrain and flat shading. There's also a new horizon effect and you can change its glow color separately from the clouds.

[h1]UPDATED 02-11-2018[/h1]
Better procedural texture filtering. Less flickering on flat ground, sharper lines on high ground in the distance.

Project files (02-11-2018): https://drive.google.com/open?id=1HyrfbGOs4JWB-4okP3uq9c9Xz7KoUbHA (already uses new sliders, so it won't fully work without the program being updated.)
title: Neon Sunset
